title: 2021-11-03 - New Tool- cs-extract-key.py
plain_text:
# New Tool: cs-extract-key.py

**[blog.didierstevens.com/2021/11/03/new-tool-cs-extract-key-py/](https://blog.didierstevens.com/2021/11/03/new-tool-cs-extract-key-py/)**

## Wednesday 3 November 2021


November 3, 2021


[Filed under: Announcement,Encryption,My Software — Didier Stevens @ 0:00](https://blog.didierstevens.com/category/announcement/)

cs-extract-key.py is a tool designed to extract cryptographic keys from Cobalt Strike beacon
process memory dumps.

[This tool was already available in my beta repository.](https://github.com/DidierStevens/Beta)

This tool can extract cryptographic keys from process memory dumps of a version 3.x
beacon directly:

And from version 4.x together with encrypted data extracted from network capture:

More details can be found in the man page, and in and upcoming blog post.


-----

[cs-extract-key_V0_0_1.zip (https)](http://didierstevens.com/files/software/cs-extract-key_V0_0_1.zip)
